parameters.description: The request to create an air booking.

parameters.description: The request to book a car.

parameters.name: hotelBookingReq
parameters.description: The request to book a hotel.

get.summary:
Get vehicle location information linked to a car booking stored in a PNR. 

This API is only for Amadeus if the client has Travelport or Sabre configured 404 Not Found will be returned.

parameters.name: pickupDateTime
parameters.description: When vehicle will be picked up from vendor

parameters.name: returnDateTime
parameters.description: When vehicle will be returned to vendpr

parameters.name: vendorCode
parameters.description: The supplier code for the rental agency.

parameters.name: rateCode
parameters.description: Rate code returned by Travelport in availability response

parameters.name: rateHostIndicatorToken
parameters.description: Rate token returned by GDS in availability response. This is required for Travelport

parameters.name: inventoryToken
parameters.description: Inventory token returned by Travelport in availability response

parameters.name: airConditioning
parameters.description: Wether air conditioning is required or not

get.summary:
Allows the user to access information linked to a car rate, previously retrieved from an availability response.  

This API is only for Amadeus if the client has Travelport or Sabre configured 404 Not Found will be returned. 

With the exception of rateIdentifier every other parameter is required.

Gets details of car vendor location.

These feilds are required by Travelport:
- pickupDateTime
- returnDateTime
- vendor
- location

These fields are required by Sabre
- location
- vendor

These fields are required by Amadeus
- location

These are optional fields for Travelport:
- pickupLocationNumber
- returnLocation
- location

Gets details of car availability from GDS. 

This methos works with Amadeus, Sabre and Travelport. 

Vendor is required field for Sabre. Every other field is required by all GDS.

parameters.name: pickupLocation
parameters.description: The pick-up location code (Location type: Terminal).

parameters.name: dropOffLocation
parameters.description: The drop-off location code (Location type: Terminal).

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Vendor code to search for availability. (required for Sabre).

get.summary:
(Travelport and Sabre only) Retrieve electronic miscellaneous document information.

Required for Travelport:
    - providerLocatorCode
    
Optional for Travelport:
    - docNumber
    
Required for Sabre:
    - docNumber

parameters.name: docNumber
parameters.description: The document number of the EMD.

parameters.name: providerLocatorCode
parameters.description: THe provider locator code of the associated PNR.

post.summary: (Sabre only) Issue electronic miscellaneous documents (EMD).

get.summary:
Return availability for specified flights.

Required for all:
    - departureDateTime OR arrivalDateTime
    - departureLocation
    - arrivalLocation

Required for Amadeus:
    - bookingClass
    - carrier
    - totalPax
    
Optional for Travelport and Sabre:
    - bookingClass
    - carrier

parameters.name: carrier
parameters.description: The marketing or operating flight carrier.

get.summary:
Get up-to-date flight information.

Required for all:
    - departureDate
    - flightNumber
    - marketingCarrier

Required for Amadeus:
    - departureLocation
    - arrivalLocation
    - arrivalDate   
Optional for Amadeus:
    - operatingCarrier
    
Required for Sabre:
    - departureLocation
    - arrivalLocation
    
Required for Travelport:
    - segmentKey
Optional for Travelport:
    - departureLocation

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: The date the flight is leaving.

parameters.name: marketingCarrier
parameters.description: The marketing airline of the flight.

parameters.name: flightNumber
parameters.description: The flight number of the flight.

parameters.name: segmentKey
parameters.description: Key for a segment obtained from a previous GDS response.

parameters.name: departureLocation
parameters.description: The code of the location where the flight is leaving from.

parameters.name: arrivalLocation
parameters.description: The code of the location where the flight will arrive to.

get.summary:
Returns images for the specificied hotel property. This API call is only for Travelport if client has configured another GDS they will get 404 Not Found

These fields are required:
- hotelCode
- hotelChainCode

parameters.name: hotelCodes
parameters.description: The hotel code of the property to identify.

parameters.name: hotelChainCodes
parameters.description: The hotel chain code of the property to identify.

parameters.name: gallery
parameters.description: If true, return a URL for an Image Gallery, with links to all images for that property. Default: true

parameters.name: richMedia
parameters.description: If true, return a virtual tour of the hotel property. Default: true

parameters.name: sizeCode
parameters.description: Request images in a specified size category. Default: L

get.summary: Find hotels that match searching criteria

Retrieves detail about a Hotel. 

Following fields are required by all GDS:


Following fields are required by Amadeus:
- chainCode
- cityCode
- propertyCode

Following fields are required by Travelport
- chainCode
- hotelCode
- fullRateRule

Following fields are required by Sabre
- hotelCode

Note: In Sabre setting fullRateRule to true allows a client application to request additional room rate-related information. This can only be used if a client has already completed this call previously and fullRateRule can not be combined 
with any other critiera. Therefore, if client has set this to true then no other fields will be passed to Sabre.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chain code of a particular hotel.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city code of a particular hotel.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: The property code of a particular hotel.

parameters.name: fullRateRule
parameters.description: If true, return availability, rates, and descriptive data. Required field for Travelport but optional field for Sabre

parameters.name: checkIn
parameters.description: The traveler's check-in date. Optional parameter for Travelport and Sabre.

parameters.name: checkOut
parameters.description: The traveler's check-out date. Optional parameter for Travelport and Sabre

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: The total number of adult guests per booking. Optional parameter for Travelport and Sabre

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Currency used to specify {minimumCost} and {maximumCost}. Optional field for Sabre

parameters.name: minimumCost
parameters.description: Lowest price used to search for hotels. Optional field for Sabre

parameters.name: maximumCost
parameters.description: Highest price used to search hotels. Optional field for Sabre

get.summary:
Does a search for lowest fare.

Following fields are required by all GDS:
- Origin
- Departure

Following fields are required by Amadeus
- Destination
- Children
- Adults
- Travel

Following fields are required by Sabre
- Passenger number. Either Children, Adults or both need to be specified.

Following fields are required by Travelport
- Destination
- Cabin

parameters.name: carriers
parameters.description: Carriers to restrict the search to.

get.summary:
Does a search for lowest fare using a specified booking system connection ID.

Following fields are required by all GDS:
- Origin
- Departure

Following fields are required by Amadeus
- Destination
- Children
- Adults
- Travel

Following fields are required by Sabre
- Passenger number. Either Children, Adults or both need to be specified.

Following fields are required by Travelport
- Destination
- Cabin

parameters.name: bookingSystemConnectionId
parameters.description: The booking system connection ID to use for the fare search. The ID comes from the database (Core.BookingSystemConnection).

parameters.name: carriers
parameters.description: Carriers to restrict the search to.

get.summary:
Does a full fare search. Please note this method is not available with Amadeus. If a client has Amadeus configured as their GDS this method will return 404 Not Found. 

Following fields are required by Sabre and Travelport:
- Origin
- Departure

Following fields are required by Travelport
- Journey Type
- Carrier
- Destination
- BookingClass

Failure to specify any of the required fields will result in 400 Bad Request

Does a full fare search. Please note this method is not available with Amadeus. If a client has Amadeus configured as their GDS this method will return 404 Not Found  using a specified booking system connection ID. 

Following fields are required by Sabre and Travelport:
- Origin
- Departure

Following fields are required by Travelport
- Journey Type
- Carrier
- Destination
- BookingClass

Failure to specify any of the required fields will result in 400 Bad Request

parameters.name: bookingSystemConnectionId
parameters.description: The booking system connection ID to use for the fare search. The ID comes from the database (Core.BookingSystemConnection).

get.summary:
Used to display fare notes after Fare Display or after Pricing transactions. (This PSP service provides the same information as the cryptic FQN transaction.)
Can be used after a pricing or a fare display transaction.

parameters.name: searchResultId
parameters.description: SearchResultId is the Id returned by Low Fare Search and corresponds to the fare that rules are required of. This is only required for Travelport.

get.summary:
This API method is used to price informatively an itinerary without any PNR.

DepartureTime is optional every other parameter must be specified.
This function is used to price itinerary of the active PNR. This is only available on Amadeus.

parameters.name: paxSegRefNum
parameters.description: The passenger reference number to price in the PNR. This parameter is optional.

400.description: The call could not be processed.

404.description: The client has configured Sabre or Travelport but this call only works with Amadeus

parameters.name: paxSegRefNum
parameters.description: The passenger reference number to price in the PNR. This parameter is optional.

400.description: The call could not be processed.

404.description: The client has configured Sabre or Travelport but this call only works with Amadeus

all cabin classes (class of service) that are currently available on the flights that make up the itinerary.

all cabin classes (class of service) that are currently available on the flights that make up the itinerary.

post.summary:
Move a PNR from one queue to another.

Required for Amadeus: 
    - dstQueue
    - dstQueueCategory
    - srcQueue
    - srcQueueCategory
    - officeId
    
Required for Travelport:
    - dstQueue
    - providerLocatorCode
    
Required for Sabre:
    - dstQueue
    - srcQueue

Required for TravelportGWS:
    - dstQueue
    - dstQueueCategory (optional)
    - providerLocatorCode
    - officeId
    - receivedFrom

parameters.name: providerLocatorCode
parameters.description: The provider locator code of the PNR to move.

post.summary:
Move a PNR from one queue to another by connection.

Required for Amadeus: 
    - dstQueue
    - dstQueueCategory
    - srcQueue
    - srcQueueCategory
    - officeId
    
Required for Travelport:
    - dstQueue
    - providerLocatorCode
    
Required for Sabre:
    - dstQueue
    - srcQueue

Required for TravelportGWS:
    - dstQueue
    - dstQueueCategory (optional)
    - providerLocatorCode
    - officeId
    - receivedFrom

parameters.name: providerLocatorCode
parameters.description: The provider locator code of the PNR to move.

post.summary:
(Amadeus only) Allows the Amadeus system to process fares from an itinerary for the flight segments in a PNR (Passenger Name Record). 

The system prices the itinerary in the currency of the country of origin, and includes the equivalent amount to be paid when the journey does not 
originate in the country where your terminal is located.

Fares can be requested for selected passengers, or for all passengers in a PNR
In the case where more than one fare is applicable for an itinerary, the system displays a list of applicable fares. 
The system will display the price for three minutes.

(Amadeus only) Allows the Amadeus system to process fares from an itinerary for the flight segments in a PNR (Passenger Name Record) using a specified booking system connection ID. 

The system prices the itinerary in the currency of the country of origin, and includes the equivalent amount to be paid when the journey does not 
originate in the country where your terminal is located.

Fares can be requested for selected passengers, or for all passengers in a PNR
In the case where more than one fare is applicable for an itinerary, the system displays a list of applicable fares. 
The system will display the price for three minutes.

parameters.name: bookingSystemConnectionId
parameters.description: The booking system connection ID to use for fetching this PNR. The ID comes from the database (Core.BookingSystemConnection).
